page.title: 19Landscape and Buildings
page.content: Our survey area is composed very largely of farmland with the River Fal twisting its way through it.The area is quite well wooded.The farms are mixed with cattle and agriculture.Corn and Barley are grown and so are soft fruits like strawberries at Fentongollan Farm.The area is very thinly populated with the exception of Malpas which is a small village on the banks of the Fal with a heron colony on an island in the middle.There are some abandoned and disused quarries.The roads are very narrow and twisty and the river is prone to silting up.There is no industry at all in this survey area.
